# url

**Instance Property**

A merchant URL.

## Declaration

```swift
var url: URL? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The maximum length of the URL is 64 characters, including the schema. To disable the merchant URL, set [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/NFCVASCommandConfiguration/url] to `nil.`

## Setting Configuration Items

- **mode**: A VAS protocol mode.
- **VASMode**: Constants that indicate the VAS protocol mode.
- **passTypeIdentifier**: A type identifier for the Wallet Pass.
